query:
UPDATE releases SET is_latest = 0 WHERE is_latest = 1;

INSERT INTO releases (version, title, changelog, release_type, is_latest, windows_url, mac_url, linux_url, created_at, updated_at)
SELECT 
  '3.0.0',
  'Archibald Titan v3.0 — Auto-Sync, Smart Fetch & Health Trends',
  '## What''s New in v3.0

### Scheduled Auto-Sync
- [x] Configure daily, weekly, biweekly, or monthly automatic credential re-fetches
- [x] Set preferred sync time and day of week
- [x] Select specific providers or sync all at once
- [x] Enable/disable individual schedules with one click
- [x] View next scheduled run time and last sync results
- [x] Full sync history with status tracking

### Smart Fetch Recommendations
- [x] AI-powered analysis of your credential usage patterns
- [x] Identifies stale credentials that need refreshing
- [x] Detects rotation-due keys based on provider best practices
- [x] Priority-ranked recommendations (critical, high, medium, low)
- [x] One-click action to fetch recommended credentials
- [x] Dismiss or accept recommendations with tracking
- [x] Generate fresh recommendations on demand

### Provider Health Trends
- [x] Historical performance charts with 7/14/30/90 day views
- [x] Per-provider success rate breakdown with visual bars
- [x] Daily activity chart showing aggregate fetch performance
- [x] Summary cards: active providers, success rate, total jobs, failures
- [x] Trend detection: improving, declining, or stable per provider
- [x] Average fetch duration tracking per provider

### Other Improvements
- [x] Download Latest button on all release entries (cumulative updates)
- [x] 313 tests passing (25 new tests for v3.0 features)
- [x] Database schema optimized with 3 new tables
- [x] Sidebar navigation reorganized for v3.0 features',
  'stable',
  1,
  windows_url,
  mac_url,
  linux_url,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
FROM releases WHERE version = '2.0.0' LIMIT 1;
